name: SMAX
description:
A twitchy action arcade puzzler with 2 attacks, dodging & countering, 6 enemy types, and ramping difficulty. See if you can make it to 2 or even 3 minutes!

Solo effort for the Ludum Dare 31 3-day jam. This version has an extra day of love, bug-fixing, and balance-smoothing put into it.

-------------------------

prevent enemy rectangles from attacking your circle

8-directional movement - fast attack (z) - strong attack (x)

dodge (space) avoids attack - face attacking enemy & dodge to counter all enemies

different colors of enemies have different movement, attack, and hp

learning the types and mastering dodge counters are the keys to success!
